trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-yet another recording device has arrived-ho. Whatever Konogg's up to, as long as he keeps sending these, we can assume he's safe and well. Anyway, here you go.
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_VILLAGERD03954_000_002<tab>Um, Chief? Can I speak with you for a moment?
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_VILLAGERD03954_000_004<tab>It's Glagg. I ran into him just now, and he was behaving oddly...
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_VILLAGERD03954_000_005<tab>Just when you think he's angry, he suddenly bursts into tears. And the next thing you know, he's talking with you like you're an old friend.
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_DWARFMASTER03671_000_006<tab>Ah, that... He's been that way since the meeting.
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007<tab>But I'll sort him out, so don't worry. Thanks for bringing me word, and let me know if you notice anything else.
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008<tab>It seems Glagg's condition isn't common knowledge yet. But it's only a matter of time if it continues to worsen, like it seems to be doing.
TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_DWARFMASTER03671_000_009<tab>Sorry, I'm saying all of this out loud, but it's not your problem to deal with. Just stay focused on the rebuilding─that's how you'll best help us.

TEXT_LUCKTA515_04048_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>The message can be viewed in your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
